title: Painful moment 3ft pike sinks its teeth into Russian fisherman's groin and won't let go
text:
The embarrassing incident was recorded on a fishing boat on a Russian river

He then awkwardly used a knife to prise its jaw open without the fish biting again

A pike was spotted sinking its teeth into a fisherman's groin after being caught

This is the rather awkward moment a pike sank its teeth into the groin of the Russian fisherman trying to catch it.

The underwater angler, named Artemiy, is seen standing wide-legged in a wet suit on a boat with the wriggling fish firmly attached to his manhood.

He had been fishing with friends on a Russian river when he caught the nibbler.

In the footage, Artemiy's friends hold back their laughter as he struggles to pull the sharp-toothed fish from his groin.

His friend Tyoma asks: 'Are your testicles alive?'

He replies with relief: 'She missed.'

This is the rather awkward moment a pike sank its teeth into the groin of Russian underwater angler Artemiy who was trying to catch it

But rather than struggle with creature, Artemiy keeps his composure, and first picks the other pike he has caught off his blade.

Artemiy then grabs a knife to free himself from the pike's clenched teeth, his mate helpfully says: 'Don't cut off anything there.'

The angler says: 'This is the first time I've seen such a thing.'

But his friend is still worried about Artemiy getting bitten in his privates.

Artemiy then grabs a knife to free himself from the pike's clenched teeth, his mate helpfully says: 'Don't cut off anything there'

'I'm afraid she'll snap her teeth again,' he said.

But eventually as the video shows he cuts the fish free.

Fresh water northern pike can be found in rivers across Canada, the USA, Britain and parts of Western Russia.

Not particularly picky with their food, pike use their several hundred teeth to feed on other fish, frogs, or even waterbirds.
description: Underwater angler Artemiy was fishing on a Russian river with friends when an angry northern pike bit his groin and refused to let go.
